effect_entries.effect: Held by Clamperl: Doubles the holder's Special Attack.  Evolves the holder into Huntail when traded.
effect_entries.short_effect: Doubles Clamperl's Special Attack. Traded on a Clamperl: Holder evolves into Huntail.

flavor_text_entries.text:
パールルに　持たせると
特攻が　あがる　キバ。
鋭く　銀色に　光る。

An item to be held by Clamperl.
This fang gleams a sharp silver and
raises the holder’s Sp. Atk stat.

Strumento da dare a Clamperl.
Dente dai bagliori argentei che aumenta
l’Attacco Speciale.

Gema con forma de gota de agua que fortalece
los movimientos de tipo Agua. Debe llevarla un
Pokémon.

Ein Item, das von Perlu getragen werden kann.
Es schimmert silbern und hebt den Spezial-Angriff.

Objet à faire tenir à Coquiperl.
Une dent de couleur argent qui augmente
son Attaque Spéciale.

진주몽에게 지니게 하면
특수공격이 올라가는 이빨.
날카로운 은색으로 빛난다.

パールルに　もたせると
とくこうが　あがる　キバ。
するどく　ぎんいろに　ひかる。

An item to be held by Clamperl.
A fang that gleams a sharp silver, it
raises the Sp. Atk stat.

An item to be held by Clamperl.
A fang that gleams a sharp silver, it
raises the Sp. Atk stat.

Objet à faire tenir à Coquiperl.
Dent de couleur argent montant
son Attaque Spéciale.

A fang that gleams a sharp silver, it
raises the Sp. Atk stat.

A fang that gleams a sharp silver, it
raises the Sp. Atk stat.

An item to be held by CLAMPERL.
A fang that gleams a sharp silver, it
raises the Sp. Atk stat.

An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A fang that gleams a sharp silver.
It raises the SP. ATK stat.

A hold item that
raises the SP. ATK
of CLAMPERL.
